mapper.select:
select
from t_ztgl_bid_record where object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and bidder_id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status='CRT'

select b.object_name objectName,count(a.id) bidderNum,max(a.bid_amount) maxBidAmount,min(a.bid_amount) minBidAmount from t_ztgl_bid_record a inner JOIN t_ztgl_object b on a.object_id = b.object_id where b.object_id = #{object_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from t_ztgl_bid_record where object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = 'OK#'

mapper.update:
update t_ztgl_bid_record
object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bidder_id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bid_amount = #{bidAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bid_status = #{bidStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_start_time = #{projectStartTime,jdbcType=DATE},
project_description = #{projectDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_end_time = #{projectEndTime,jdbcType=DATE},
pm_certification_No = #{pmCertificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
constructor_certification_No = #{constructorCertificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safety_permit_No = #{safetyPermitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pm_safety_certification_No = #{pmSafetyCertificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pm_certification_url = #{pmCertificationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
constructor_certification_url = #{constructorCertificationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safety_permit_url = #{safetyPermitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pm_safety_certification_url = #{pmSafetyCertificationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pm_certification_endtime = #{pmCertificationEndtime,jdbcType=DATE},
constructor_certification_endtime = #{constructorCertificationEndtime,jdbcType=DATE},
safety_permit_endtime = #{safetyPermitEndtime,jdbcType=DATE},
pm_safety_certification_endtime = #{pmSafetyCertificationEndtime,jdbcType=DATE},
bank_guarantee_No = #{bankGuaranteeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_guarantee_url = #{bankGuaranteeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_guarantee_amount = #{bankGuaranteeAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
project_quotation_url = #{projectQuotationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
construction_commitment_url = #{constructionCommitmentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
construction_end_date = #{constructionEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
construction_start_date = #{constructionStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
technical_standard_url = #{technicalStandardUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_ztgl_bid_record set object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bidder_id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bid_amount = #{bidAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bid_status = #{bidStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_start_time = #{projectStartTime,jdbcType=DATE}, project_description = #{projectDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_end_time = #{projectEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, pm_certification_No = #{pmCertificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, constructor_certification_No = #{constructorCertificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safety_permit_No = #{safetyPermitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pm_safety_certification_No = #{pmSafetyCertificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pm_certification_url = #{pmCertificationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, constructor_certification_url = #{constructorCertificationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safety_permit_url = #{safetyPermitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pm_safety_certification_url = #{pmSafetyCertificationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pm_certification_endtime = #{pmCertificationEndtime,jdbcType=DATE}, constructor_certification_endtime = #{constructorCertificationEndtime,jdbcType=DATE}, safety_permit_endtime = #{safetyPermitEndtime,jdbcType=DATE}, pm_safety_certification_endtime = #{pmSafetyCertificationEndtime,jdbcType=DATE}, bank_guarantee_No = #{bankGuaranteeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_guarantee_url = #{bankGuaranteeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_guarantee_amount = #{bankGuaranteeAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_quotation_url = #{projectQuotationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, construction_commitment_url = #{constructionCommitmentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, construction_end_date = #{constructionEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, construction_start_date = #{constructionStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, technical_standard_url = #{technicalStandardUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update t_ztgl_bid_record set bid_status ='LOS' where object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and bidder_id != #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_ztgl_bid_record b on a.object_id = b.object_id and b.status = 'OK#' LEFT JOIN t_qyzz_bidder c on b.bidder_id = c.id and c.status = 'OK#' LEFT JOIN t_ztgl_object_project_info d on a.object_id LEFT JOIN t_ztgl_bid_attachment e on b.id = e.bid_id and e.attachment_type = 'BF#' where a.biddee_id = #{biddeeId} and a.object_id =#{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select b.id,c.company_name,b.bidder_id,b.bid_amount,b.insert_time,d.project_expect_start_date,d.project_expect_end_date,d.project_expect_period,e.attachment_url from t_ztgl_object a INNER JOIN t_ztgl_bid_record b on a.object_id = b.object_id and b.status = 'OK#' LEFT JOIN t_qyzz_bidder c on b.bidder_id = c.id and c.status = 'OK#' LEFT JOIN t_ztgl_object_project_info d on a.object_id = d.object_id LEFT JOIN t_ztgl_bid_attachment e on b.id = e.bid_id and e.attachment_type = 'BF#' where a.biddee_id = #{biddeeId} and a.object_id =#{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
limit #{page.firstResult,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,#{page.pageSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
